title: Air rune

properties.name: description
properties.value: Air runes are one of the four elemental runes in RuneScape. Players can craft air runes with a Runecraft level of 1 at the Air Altar (located south-west of Falador), granting 5 Runecraft experience per Rune essence or Pure essence used.

Item ID556

Air runes are one of the four elemental runes in RuneScape. Players can craft air runes with a Runecraft level of 1 at the Air Altar (located south-west of Falador), granting 5 Runecraft experience per Rune essence or Pure essence used.

Contents

  • 1 Information
  • 2 Prices
  • 3 Runecraft info
  • 4 Spells requiring air runes
  • 5 Products
  • 6 Item sources
    • 6.1 Store locations
    • 6.2 Item spawns
  • 7 Changes
    • 7.1 Gallery (historical)
  • 8 Trivia

Information[edit | edit source]

Air runes are used in every missile spell as well as most teleportation spells in the standard spellbook. They are used very often, so players are recommended to purchase a Staff of air or better. Staves of air can be bought from Zaff's Superior Staffs! shop in Varrock.

The air rune can be combined with water rune to make a mist rune, with a earth rune to make a dust rune, and with fire rune to make a smoke rune.

Another way to obtain air runes is to talk to the magic tutor in Lumbridge. She will give you 30 air and mind runes if you don't have any in your inventory, bank, or on the ground near you.

Prices[edit | edit source]

Air runes do not cost very much money, as players can craft them at a low level and there are many in the game. They are widely used in magic spells and are easy to find. Air runes can be bought from Magic shops for 4 to 25 coins, depending on the stock. Players can buy runes from Aubury's Rune Shop in Varrock and from the store in Port Sarim. The store at the Void Knight Outpost is often full of stock so they are not as expensive as in other stores.

A popular money making technique among lower level players is to buy these runes from one of the rune shops and then sell them on the Grand Exchange for 1 or 2 coins more.

They can also be purchased from the Nightmare Zone, using 25 reward points.

rawContent:
{{External|rs|rsc=Air-Rune}} {{Infobox Item |name = Air rune |image = [[File:Air rune.png]] |release = [[4 January]] [[2001]] |update = Runescape beta is now online! |members = No |quest = No |tradeable = Yes |placeholder = Yes |equipable = No |stackable = Yes |noteable = No |destroy = Drop |examine = One of the 4 basic elemental Runes. |respawn = 100 |value = 4 |weight = 0.000 |exchange = Yes |id = 556 }} [[File:Air rune detail.png|left|120px]] '''Air runes''' are one of the four elemental [[runes]] in ''[[RuneScape]]''. Players can craft air runes with a [[Runecraft]] level of 1 at the [[Air Altar]] (located south-west of [[Falador]]), granting 5 Runecraft experience per [[Rune essence]] or [[Pure essence]] used. ==Information== Air runes are used in every missile spell as well as most teleportation spells in the [[standard spellbook]]. They are used very often, so players are recommended to purchase a [[Staff of air]] or better. Staves of air can be bought from [[Zaff's Superior Staffs!]] shop in [[Varrock]]. The air rune can be combined with [[water rune]] to make a [[mist rune]], with a [[earth rune]] to make a [[dust rune]], and with [[fire rune]] to make a [[smoke rune]]. Another way to obtain air runes is to talk to the magic tutor in [[Lumbridge]]. She will give you 30 air and [[mind rune]]s if you don't have any in your inventory, bank, or on the ground near you. ==Prices== Air runes do not cost very much money, as players can [[Runecraft|craft]] them at a low level and there are many in the game. They are widely used in magic spells and are easy to find. Air runes can be bought from [[Magic shops]] for 4 to 25 coins, depending on the stock. Players can buy runes from [[Aubury's Rune Shop]] in [[Varrock]] and from the store in [[Port Sarim]]. The store at the [[Void Knight Outpost]] is often full of stock so they are not as expensive as in other stores. A popular money making technique among lower level players is to buy these runes from one of the rune shops and then sell them on the Grand Exchange for 1 or 2 coins more. They can also be purchased from the [[Nightmare Zone]], using 25 reward points. ==Runecraft info== {{Tabber |tab1=Rune essence |tab1content={{Recipe |skill1 = Runecraft |skill1lvl = 1 |skill1exp = 5 |members = no |ticks = 1 |facilities = Air Altar |tools = Air tiara, Air talisman |notes = [[Multiple runes|More runes]] per essence every 11th level. |mat1 = Rune essence |output1 = Air rune }} |tab2=Pure essence |tab2content={{Recipe |skill1 = Runecraft |skill1lvl = 1 |skill1exp = 5 |members = no |ticks = 1 |facilities = Air Altar |tools = Air tiara, Air talisman |notes = [[Multiple runes|More runes]] per essence every 11th level. |mat1 = Pure essence |output1 = Air rune }} |tab3=Daeyalt essence |tab3content={{Recipe |skill1 = Runecraft |skill1lvl = 1 |skill1exp = 7.5 |members = yes |ticks = 1 |facilities = Air Altar |tools = Air tiara, Air talisman |notes = [[Multiple runes|More runes]] per essence every 11th level. |mat1 = Daeyalt essence |mat1cost = no |output1 = Air rune }} |tab4=Guardian essence |tab4content={{Recipe |skill1 = Runecraft |skill1lvl = 27 |skill1boostable = no |skill1exp = 5 |members = yes |ticks = 1 |facilities = Air Altar |notes = [[Multiple runes|More runes]] per essence every 11th level.
